messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

remove from md testers thursday mailing testers dear person mailing take her off please she initial thanks lot wednesday pm re stories tasks without components please hello please testers part thank kind regards wednesday pm stories tasks without components please guys please accurate stories tasks create created without component indication otherwise cannot which stream belongs backlog common story log spent retesting involved thanks lot play best
